verses.text: How hast thou \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* \add him that is\add* without \w power|strong="H3581"\w*? \add how\add* \w savest|strong="H3467"\w* thou the \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \add that hath\add* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*?

How hast thou \w counselled|strong="H3289"\w* \add him that hath\add* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*? and \add how\add* hast thou \w plentifully|strong="H7230"\w* \w declared|strong="H3045"\w* the thing as it \w is|strong="H8454"\w*?
To whom hast thou \w uttered|strong="H5046"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*? and whose \w spirit|strong="H5397"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* from thee?

\w Dead|strong="H7496"\w* \add things\add* are \w formed|strong="H2342"\w* from under the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H7931"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 26.5 \ft and the…: or, with the inhabitants\f*
\w Hell|strong="H7585"\w* \add is\add* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* before him, and \w destruction|strong="H0011"\w* hath no \w covering|strong="H3682"\w*.

He stretcheth \w out|strong="H5186"\w* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* over the empty \w place|strong="H8414"\w*, \add and\add* \w hangeth|strong="H8518"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* upon \w nothing|strong="H1099"\w*.
He bindeth \w up|strong="H6887"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* in his thick \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w*; and the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* is not \w rent|strong="H1234"\w* under them.
He holdeth \w back|strong="H0270"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \add and\add* \w spreadeth|strong="H6576"\w* his \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* upon it.

He hath \w compassed|strong="H2328"\w* the \w waters|strong="H6440"\w* with \w bounds|strong="H2706"\w*, until the \w day|strong="H0216"\w* and \w night|strong="H2822"\w* come to an \w end|strong="H8503"\w*.\f + \fr 26.10 \ft until…: Heb. until the end of light with darkness\f*
The \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w tremble|strong="H7322"\w* and are \w astonished|strong="H8539"\w* at his \w reproof|strong="H1606"\w*.

He \w divideth|strong="H7280"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* with his \w power|strong="H3581"\w*, and by his \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* he \w smiteth|strong="H4272"\w* through the \w proud|strong="H7293"\w*.\f + \fr 26.12 \ft the proud: Heb. pride\f*

By his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* he hath \w garnished|strong="H8235"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w formed|strong="H2342"\w* the \w crooked|strong="H1281"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*.

Lo, these \add are\add* \w parts|strong="H7098"\w* of his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: but how \w little|strong="H8102"\w* a \w portion|strong="H1697"\w* is \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of him? but the \w thunder|strong="H7482"\w* of his \w power|strong="H1369"\w* who can \w understand|strong="H0995"\w*?
